column1: Accessories PS-AMS;Terminal Box;To avoid that the actuator has to be opened on site, a plug and socket connection provides a big benefit. This way it can be assured that the delivery status — e.g. IP68 — of the autmated valve is not altered by the electric connection on site.Plug with 32 numbered pins, impossible to confuse. Easy exchange of actuators because of identical connector pin assignment of all AMS actuators.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_steckerverbinder.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_steckerverbinder.png;;;terminal-box;https://www.ps-automation.com/products-2/terminal-box/?lang=en

Accessories PS-AMS;Control room heating (HR);For environments with high temperature fluctuations or high humidity, we recommend a heating resistor be fitted to prevent the build up of condensation within the enclosure.The heating resistor is designed to ensure a minimum operating temperature in small enclosures. Self regulating and temperature limiting.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_hr.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_hr.png;;Instructions

Accessories PS-AMS;Communication Software (PSCS USB);Enables the communication between the actuator and a PC, giving access to parameters and data log. A freely available software is necessary to run PSCS USB.  The software can be downloaded with the following link:Software PSCS;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;;"Instructions

Accessories PS-AMS;Ethernet and fieldbus interfaces;Integrated Ethernet / fieldbus interface. The optional Ethernet /fieldbus-interface allows operation of the actuator.The interface can be used with “Profibus DP”, “CANopen”, “Profinet”, “Modbus” and “HART Protocol”.Available as PSPDP (Profibus DP), PSCAN (CANopen), PSPN (Profinet) and PSMOD (Modbus) . Other Ethernet / fieldbus interfaces are available on request.The Configuration Files can be downloaded with the following link:Configuration File ProfibusDP V1.3Configuration File Profinet V2.33;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_pspdp_pscan.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_pspdp_pscan.png;;"Product Summary

Accessories PS-AMS;Integrated Process Controller (PSIC);Enables the autonomous control of a process so that an external controller is not required. The specification of the process setpoint is made via fieldbus or an analogue signal (mA or V). 24 VDC sensor power supply is integrated (max. 100mA).;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;;"Product Summary

Accessories PS-AMS;Power Fail-Safe Device (PSCP);PSCP provides an integrated emergency-power supply based on supercapacitors. This allows the valve to move into a previously defined ‘safety position’. Our energy pack is designed for 500.000 loading cycles, short recharge times and is maintenance free.PSCP cannot be combined with FSP.Compared to batteries, supercapacitors offer many advantages:– maintenance-free operation without the familiar battery “memory effect”– lifetime of more than 10 years if operated below 55°C, capacity monitoring is therefore unnecessary– high number of life cycles and load capability due to a low internal resistance, full force is available at all times– significantly better high and low temperature tolerance– recharging within a few minutes without losing capacity, the actuator is quickly made ready for a new emergency cycle;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_pscp.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_pscp.png;;"Product Summary

Accessories PS-AMS;On-site Control (PSC.2, PSC.3);Enables the user to operate the valve by push-buttons and gives access to the parametrization of smart linear and quarter turn actuators, without using a PC. Additionally, the valve position is shown in an illuminated display. By using a padlock, unauthorized use is prevented.For intelligent linear actuators PS-AMS PSL up to 14 kN, the interface is installed instead of the cover of the terminal box. For intelligent quarter-turn actuators PS-AMS PSQ and intelligent linear actuators PSL320-325AMS, the interface is mounted on an external terminal box. For intelligent quarter-turn actuators PS-AMS PSQ-S the new generation of local control PSC.3 is mounted on an external terminal box.– Valve operation via push buttons– Indication of valve position– Easy adaption to the valve and control signals– Read out of diagnostic values– Parametrisation;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psc2.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psc2.png;;"Product Summary

column2: Installation Instruction PSC.2 for PSL Mod. 4

column1: Accessories PS-AMS;Fail Safe Port (FSP);The fail-safe port 12+13 (terminals 25+26 on plug modules) allows to drive the actuator to a pre-defined position. This “fail-safe position” has to be parameterised via PC interface PSCS. A signal on the fail-safe port has the highest priority among all input signals.– Signal voltage 24 V AC/DC – This function is not available in case a PSCP is installed.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_fsp.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_fsp.png;;;fsp;https://www.ps-automation.com/products-2/fsp/?lang=en

Accessories PS-AMS;Fault Indication Relay (FIR);FIR provides a signal in case of a malfunction. Load at 24 VDC: 100mA. Relevant malfunctions can be selected and are defined by the software.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_fir.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_fir.png;;;fir;https://www.ps-automation.com/products-2/fir/?lang=en

Accessories PS-AMS;Two additional position switches (2WE-AMS);The two additional position switches allow the detection of two fully adjustable actuator positions.The signal is available in open & close direction of travel. Standard switches with silver contacts are suitable for currents 100 mA to 5 A at voltages in the range of 24 V to 230 V AC/DC. For lower power up to 0,12 VA (0,1 mA to 100 mA at 1 V to 24 V AC/DC) we recommend switches with gold contacts (2WE Gold).Variants:– 2WE/ 2WE Gold – 2WO/ 2WO Gold (for AMS only) – 2WC/ 2WC Gold (for AMS only);https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2WE-AMS.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2WE-AMS.png;;"Instructions

Accessories Standard;Diagnostic Software PSCS.PSF;Enables the communication between the actuator and a PC, giving access to parameters and data log.A freely available software is necessary to run PSCS PSF. The software can be downloaded with the following link:Software PSCS.PSF;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-_PSCS_USB.png;;Instructions

Accessories Standard;Electronic positioner (PSAP);The electronic positioner allows control of the actuator via 0(2)-10V or 0(4)-20 mA signal. Signal range, sensitivity and zero position are adjustable. When retrofitting, please be aware that a potentiometer PD210 or PD2 210 (1kΩ when combined with PSPT) is required.Variants:– PSAP.2A PSAP.2A/R (for motor current > 1A)– PSAP.3 PSAP.3/R (for motor current > 1A)How to commission PSAP.3;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PSAP.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PSAP.png;;"Technical Data

column2: Installation Instruction PSAP for PSL Mod. 4
Installation Instruction PSAP for PSQx03, PSR and PSL Mod. 3
Installation Instruction PSAP.2/R and PSAP.3/R with extern Relais for PSL Mod. 4

column1: Accessories Standard;Electronic position transmitter (PSPT);The electronic position transmitter PSPT transmits the actuator position as a (0)4-20 mA signal. The signal range and the zero-point (only with PSPT03) are fully adjustable.When retrofitting, please be aware that a potentiometer PD210 or PD2 210 (1kΩ when combined with PSAP) is required.Variants:– PSPT02 (2-wire type) – PSPT03 (3-wire type);https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PSPT.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PSPT.png;;"Technical Data

Accessories Standard;Potentiometer (PD);The potentiometer is used to feed the actual valve position back to the positioning circuit. It can be wired to an external control circuit or the integrated positioner PSAP and/or the electronic position transmitter PSPT. Available as single or tandem potentiometer.Variants:– PD210 (100 Ω, 200 Ω, 500 Ω, 1 kΩ, 2 kΩ) – PD210 (for PSAP or PSPT, 1×1 kΩ) – PD2 210 (for PSAP and PSPT, 2×1 kΩ);https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PD.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_PD.png;;"Technical Data

column2: Installation Instruction PD V1 for PSL Mod. 4 with Main Frame V2
Installation Instructions Potentiometer V2 PSL Model 4 with Main Frame V2

column1: Accessories Standard;Two additional limit switches (2DE);The two additional limit switches allow the detection of the maximum torque limit. Maximum torque is detected in “open” & “close” direction of travel.The signal is made over a potential-free changeover contact. They are suitable for currents from 100 mA to 5 A. Gold contacts are available for currents from 0.1 mA to 100 mA.Variants: 2DE/ 2DE Gold (only PSQ);https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2DE.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2DE.png;;Technical Data
column2: Data sheet Two Additional Limit Switches 2DE/2WE

column1: Accessories Standard;Two additional position switches (2WE);The two additional position switches allow the detection of two fully adjustable actuator positions.The signal is available in the “open” and “close” direction of travel. Standard switches with silver contacts are suitable for currents 100 mA to 5 A at voltages in the range of 24 V to 230 V AC/DC. For lower power up to 0,12 VA (0,1 mA to 100 mA at 1 V to 24 V AC/DC) we recommend switches with gold contacts (2WE Gold).Variants:– 2WE/ 2WE Gold – 2WO/ 2WO Gold (for AMS only) – 2WC/ 2WC Gold (for AMS only);https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2WE.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_2WE.png;;"Technical Data

column1: Accessories Standard;Control room heating (HR);For environments with high temperature fluctuations or high humidity, we recommend a heating resistor be fitted to prevent the build up of condensation within the enclosure.The heating resistor is designed to ensure a minimum operating temperature in small enclosures. Self regulating and temperature limiting.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_hr.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_hr.png;;Instructions

Accessories Standard;Drive Bush;Drive bush is used for mechanical connection between a quarter-turn actuator and a valve shaft. There are various machinings available such as square, double d, keyway.;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_Steckkupplung.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_Steckkupplung.png;;Technical Data

column1: Ex-Proof Acuators;PS-AMS PSQ-S;PS-AMS PSQ-S is an intelligent quarter-turn actuator with a new  compact actuator housing and Wi-Fi Access Point for easy and wireless parameterisation with mobile devices. Available in torque ranges: 60-200 Nm, 250-400 Nm and 450-1500 Nm.Optimized gearbox with brushless motor for energy-efficient and application friendly operation. With Hall-sensor is the contactlessand non-wearing position monitoring possible.Planned is ATEX-approval in Zone 1 and 2 as well as Zone 21 and 22 according to ATEX-directive 2014-34-EU equipment group II, category 2.– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Wi-Fi Access Point– 7-segment display for parameterisation– Contactless position indicator for reliable tightness– New compact actuator housing with enclosure IP68– All accessories are fully integrable under the main cover;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;TECHNICAL DATA

Ex-Proof Acuators;PSF-EX / PSF-M-EX;The approved explosion-proof linear actuator PSF-EX / PSF-M-EX with fail safe function has contactless, nonwearing travel detection with Hall sensor for exact positioning. Power spring is integrated for fail safe function in case of loss of power supply, either extending or retracting actuator stem.– EX protection according to ATEX:   TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex h db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db   Ex h tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– EX protection according to IECEx:   IECEx TPS 22.0019X (www.iecex.com)   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– Manual operation of the acuator possible also in hazardous area– Integrated power spring– Controller with integrated positioner function– Automatic commissioning;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-ex_psf-m-ex.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-ex_psf-m-ex.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column2: EU-Type Examination Certificate TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X

column1: Ex-Proof Acuators;PSF-Q-EX / PSF-Q-M-EX;The PSF-Q-EX / PSF-Q-M-EX is a multifunctional explosion-proof actuator for industrial valves in various applications with either extending or retracting output stem in case of power failure. It features contactless, non-wearing travel detection with Hall sensor for exact positioning.PSF-Q-EX: integrated power spring causes the fail safe in the case of loss of power supplyPSF-Q-M-EX: manual override can be operated by using the hand wheel or the two buttons of the local control– EX protection according to ATEX:   TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex h db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db   Ex h tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– EX protection according to IECEx:   IECEx TPS 22.0019X (www.iecex.com)   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C DbDue to its robustness and small dimensions the PSF-Q-EX/PSF-Q-M-EX series is an interesting extension of the product range for the industrial as well as the heating, ventilation and air-conditioning sectors.– Microprocessor-supported control with integrated positioners– Brushless DC motor (BLDC)– Contactless, non-wearing position decoding with Hall sensor– Robust industrial design with polycarbonate cover Powder-coated aluminum gearbox– Manual operation of the acuator possible also in hazardous area– Integrated power spring– Controller with integrated positioner function– Automatic commissioning;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column2: EU-Type Examination Certificate TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X

column1: Linear Actuators;PS-AMS PSL;PS-AMS is the patented smart actuator solution of PS Automation GmbH for linear actuators up to 25 kN thrust. The new generation PS- AMS11/12/13 was developed from the proven PS-AMS01/02/03,is available for various voltages, and mechanical adaptation to most types of valves can be done.PS-AMS actuators include enhanced electronics with an embedded micro-controller with flash memory that controls and monitors the entire actuator function.Summarizing all functions on a single circuit board makes the PS-AMS actuators extremely safe in operation and easy to assemble. As a result, production costs are low and the value for money is outstanding.– Programmable actuator– Positioner & position feedback integrated– Automatic commissioning function– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Various options, among others: electrical fail-safe unit PSCP, field bus interface, local control panel PSC.2;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-ams-mit-beschreibungen4-2.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-ams-mit-beschreibungen4-2.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Linear Actuators;PSL;The cover and switching mechanism design of the PSL valve actuators for a wider range of applications, with more space for electronics and reduced cost. The PSL valve actuators fulfil all requirements for control valve actuators with remarkable efficiency.Our customers who use the PSL linear actuators profit from the unified modular concept of the accessories in several ways: There are fewer parts which need to be held in stock and the training for the sales, service and assembly personnel is reduced considerably.They position precisely, are very robust, reliable with long life, even at high loadsThe individual components are of high quality and correspond to the harmonised European standardsThe basic adjustment of a PSL actuator on a valve is simple due to the central arrangement of the switching and sensor unitsOptional accessories avaiable;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-mit-beschreibungen-3.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-mit-beschreibungen-3.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

Power spring is integrated for fail safe function in case of loss of power supply, either extending or retracting actuator stem.– EX protection according to ATEX:   TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex h db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db   Ex h tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– EX protection according to IECEx:   IECEx TPS 22.0019X (www.iecex.com)   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– Manual operation of the acuator possible also in hazardous area– Integrated power spring– Controller with integrated positioner function– Automatic commissioning;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-ex_psf-m-ex.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-ex_psf-m-ex.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Linear Actuators;PSF / PSF-M;Based on the proven PSL linear actuators we recently developed a new actuator series with mechanical fail safe function or manual override.The PSF / PSF-M is a multifunctional actuator for industrial valves in various applications with either extending or retracting output stem in case of power failure.PSF: integrated power spring causes the fail safe in the case of loss of power supplyPSF-M: manual override can be operated by using the hand wheel or the two buttons of the local control.Due to its robustness and small dimensions the PSF/PSF-M series is an interesting extension of the product range for the industrial as well as the heating, ventilation and air-conditioning sectors.– Microprocessor-supported control with integrated positioners– Brushless DC motor (BLDC)– Contactless, non-wearing position decoding with Hall sensor– Robust industrial design with polycarbonate cover Powder-coated aluminum gearbox;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psf-m.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psf-m.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

Quarter-turn Actuators;PSF-Q-EX / PSF-Q-M-EX;The PSF-Q-EX / PSF-Q-M-EX is a multifunctional explosion-proof actuator for industrial valves in various applications with either extending or retracting output stem in case of power failure. It features contactless, non-wearing travel detection with Hall sensor for exact positioning.PSF-Q-EX: integrated power spring causes the fail safe in the case of loss of power supplyPSF-Q-M-EX: manual override can be operated by using the hand wheel or the two buttons of the local control– EX protection according to ATEX:   TPS 22 ATEX 110398 0002 X   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex h db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db   Ex h tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C Db– EX protection according to IECEx:   IECEx TPS 22.0019X (www.iecex.com)   Ex db eb IIC T6/T4 Gb   Ex tb IIIC T80°C/T100°C DbDue to its robustness and small dimensions the PSF-Q-EX/PSF-Q-M-EX series is an interesting extension of the product range for the industrial as well as the heating, ventilation and air-conditioning sectors.– Microprocessor-supported control with integrated positioners– Brushless DC motor (BLDC)– Contactless, non-wearing position decoding with Hall sensor– Robust industrial design with polycarbonate cover Powder-coated aluminum gearbox– Manual operation of the acuator possible also in hazardous area– Integrated power spring– Controller with integrated positioner function– Automatic commissioning;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Quarter-turn Actuators;PSF-Q / PSF-Q-M;Based on the proven PSF linear actuators we recently developed a new actuator series with mechanical fail safe function or manual override.The PSF-Q / PSF-Q-M is a multifunctional actuator for industrial valves in various applications with either extending or retracting output stem in case of power failure.PSF-Q: integrated power spring causes the fail safe in the case of loss of power supplyPSF-Q-M: manual override can be operated by using the hand wheel or the two buttons of the local control.Due to its robustness and small dimensions the PSF-Q/PSF-Q-M series is an interesting extension of the product range for the industrial as well as the heating, ventilation and air-conditioning sectors.– Microprocessor-supported control with integrated positioners– Brushless DC motor (BLDC)– Contactless, non-wearing position decoding with Hall sensor– Robust industrial design with polycarbonate cover Powder-coated aluminum gearbox– Visual Position Indication;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-q_psf-q-m.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psf-q_psf-q-m.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

Quarter-turn Actuators;PS-AMS PSQ;PS-AMS PSQ is the patented smart actuator solution up to 3000 Nm in torque for modulating control valve applications. PS-AMS PSQ includes enhanced electronics with an embedded micro-controller with flash memory that controls and monitors the entire actuator function. Summarizing all functions on a single circuit board makes the actuator extremely compact and safe in operation. The value for money is outstanding.A PS-AMS PSQ is installed fast due to the automated one-key commissioning.– Programmable actuator– Positioner & position feedback integrated– Automatic commissioning function– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Various options, among others electrical fail-safe unit PSCP, field bus interface, local control panel PSC.2;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/hauptproduktbild-psq-ams-1011x1024.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/hauptproduktbild-psq-ams-1011x1024.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Quarter-turn Actuators;PS-AMS PSQ-S;PS-AMS PSQ-S is an intelligent quarter-turn actuator with a new  compact actuator housing and Wi-Fi Access Point for easy and wireless parameterisation with mobile devices. Available in torque ranges: 60-200 Nm, 250-400 Nm and 450-1500 Nm.Optimized gearbox with brushless motor for energy-efficient and application friendly operation. With Hall-sensor is the contactlessand non-wearing position monitoring possible.Planned is ATEX-approval in Zone 1 and 2 as well as Zone 21 and 22 according to ATEX-directive 2014-34-EU equipment group II, category 2.– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Wi-Fi Access Point– 7-segment display for parameterisation– Contactless position indicator for reliable tightness– New compact actuator housing with enclosure IP68– All accessories are fully integrable under the main cover;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;TECHNICAL DATA

Quarter-turn Actuators;PSQ;The compact PSQ quarter-turn actuators of PS Automation are available from 50 Nm up to 3000 Nm torque. Different stroke options are available e.g. 90°, 180° or others. They are even available with continuous rotation upon request.They are mature and proven, very robust and completely maintenance free. Since entering the marketing 15 years ago, gear damages by wear have not occurred under normal operation.This is why we can assume that a PSQ lasts as long as the valve. When buying a PSQ from PS Automation, the specialist for valve actuators, the only thing to consider is the reasonable price as well as the running costs. There are no maintenance costs!– Maintenance-free and highly efficient planetary gear– Adjustable torque switches– Manual operation without clutching– Exchangeable drive bush for valve stem connection– Wide range of accessories for retro-fitting;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psq.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psq.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column2: Data sheet PSQ103 Low Temperature Version -40°C
Data sheet PSQ203 Low Temperature Version -40°C
Data sheet PSQ503 Low Temperature Version -40°C
Data sheet PSQ703 Low Temperature Version -40°C

column1: Quarter-turn Actuators;PSQ-E;For the PSQ-E series we use a very economic manufacturing method and a very efficient overriding drive in order to enable robustness at low cost.The valve is protected by using torque limited motors with thermo switches instead of torque switches. You can chose between two different torques and five different operating voltages.The standard equipment includes two potential-free change-over contacts. Optionally, you can retrofit a heating, a potentiometer as well as a mA position transmitter in two- or three-wire technology.– Cover from UV-resistant poly-carbonate– Maintenance-free and highly efficient planetary gear– Manual operation without clutching;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psq-e.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild_psq-e.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

Quarter-turn Actuators;PSR-E;The quarter-turn actuator series PSR-E is the economical addition to the proven actuator series PSQ for torque requirements from 221.3 lbf in to 442.5 lbf in, directly mounted as per ISO 5211.PSR-E series is containing a maintenance-free, low-wear and low-noise spur gear resulting in high efficiency and long lifetime. The PSR-E series with various operating times is most suitable for control operation due to the use of synchronous motors without after-run.Customers who use the PSQ quarter-turn and PSL linear actuators profit from a standardisation of the modular accessories in several ways, as fewer parts must be held in stock and the training requirements for the sales, service and assembly staff are reduced considerably.– Maintenance-free and highly efficient spur gear– Cover from UV-resistant poly-carbonate– Directly mounted as per ISO 5211– Easy manual operation– Protection class IP67 optionally available;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen_psr-e.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-mit-beschreibungen_psr-e.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

Smart Actuators;PS-AMS PSL;PS-AMS is the patented smart actuator solution of PS Automation GmbH for linear actuators up to 25 kN thrust. The new generation PS- AMS11/12/13 was developed from the proven PS-AMS01/02/03,is available for various voltages, and mechanical adaptation to most types of valves can be done.PS-AMS actuators include enhanced electronics with an embedded micro-controller with flash memory that controls and monitors the entire actuator function.Summarizing all functions on a single circuit board makes the PS-AMS actuators extremely safe in operation and easy to assemble. As a result, production costs are low and the value for money is outstanding.– Programmable actuator– Positioner & position feedback integrated– Automatic commissioning function– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Various options, among others: electrical fail-safe unit PSCP, field bus interface, local control panel PSC.2;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-ams-mit-beschreibungen4-2.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psl-ams-mit-beschreibungen4-2.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Smart Actuators;PS-AMS PSQ;PS-AMS PSQ is the patented smart actuator solution up to 3000 Nm in torque for modulating control valve applications. PS-AMS PSQ includes enhanced electronics with an embedded micro-controller with flash memory that controls and monitors the entire actuator function. Summarizing all functions on a single circuit board makes the actuator extremely compact and safe in operation. The value for money is outstanding.A PS-AMS PSQ is installed fast due to the automated one-key commissioning.– Programmable actuator– Positioner & position feedback integrated– Automatic commissioning function– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Various options, among others electrical fail-safe unit PSCP, field bus interface, local control panel PSC.2;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/hauptproduktbild-psq-ams-1011x1024.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/hauptproduktbild-psq-ams-1011x1024.png;"TECHNICAL DATA

column1: Smart Actuators;PS-AMS PSQ-S;PS-AMS PSQ-S is an intelligent quarter-turn actuator with a new  compact actuator housing and Wi-Fi Access Point for easy and wireless parameterisation with mobile devices. Available in torque ranges: 60-200 Nm, 250-400 Nm and 450-1500 Nm.Optimized gearbox with brushless motor for energy-efficient and application friendly operation. With Hall-sensor is the contactlessand non-wearing position monitoring possible.Planned is ATEX-approval in Zone 1 and 2 as well as Zone 21 and 22 according to ATEX-directive 2014-34-EU equipment group II, category 2.– Comprehensive diagnostic functions– Wi-Fi Access Point– 7-segment display for parameterisation– Contactless position indicator for reliable tightness– New compact actuator housing with enclosure IP68– All accessories are fully integrable under the main cover;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;https://www.ps-automation.com/wp-content/uploads/produktbild-psq-s-ams-mit-beschreibungen.png;TECHNICAL DATA
